biotools.summary: LogoBar is a Java application to display protein sequence logos. With this application you can generate protein sequence logos from multiple sequence alignments that show the amino acid incidence at every position.

bioschemas.name: LogoBar
bioschemas.summary: LogoBar is a Java application to display protein sequence logos. With this application you can generate protein sequence logos from multiple sequence alignments that show the amino acid incidence at every position.
